text: Cuz in nest, ki suxani pinhone [ki muciʙi gunoh va dusmani megardad] az sui sajton ast, to kasonero, ki imon ovardaand, [ʙo onho giriftor kunad va dar natica] anduhgin sozad va [hol on ki u] cuz ʙa farmoni Alloh taolo nametavonad hec zarare ʙa onon ʙirasonad; pas, mu'minon ʙojad ʙar Alloh taolo tavakkal kunand
